These should all get escaped:

Backslash: \

Backtick: `

Asterisk: *

Underscore: _

Left brace: {

Right brace: }

Left bracket: [

Right bracket: ]

Left paren: (

Right paren: )

Greater-than: >

Hash: #

Period: .

Bang: !

Plus: +

Minus: -

GFM:

Pipe: |

Tilde: ~

Commonmark:

Quote: "

Dollar: $

Percentage: %

Ampersand: &

Single quote: '

Comma: ,

Forward slash: /

Colon: :

Semicolon: ;

Less-than: <

Equals: =

Question mark: ?

At-sign: @

Caret: ^

New line:
only works in paragraphs.

Two spaces:
only works in paragraphs.
